title: His Majesties gracious letter, directed to the presbytery of Edinburgh, and by them to be communicated to the rest of the presbyteries of this kirk. Received the third of September, 1660.
author: Scotland. Sovereign (1649-1685 : Charles II)
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed at Edinburgh, and reprinted for George Calvert, at the sign of the Half-Moon, near the little north door in St. Pauls Church-Yard,
